props.title: Executions
props.query: SELECT average(`oracle.database.executionsPerSecond`) as 'Executions' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Session count
props.query: SELECT latest(`oracle.database.sessionCount`) AS `Sessions` FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Transactions
props.query: SELECT average(`oracle.database.query.transactionsPerSecond`) as 'Transactions' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Disk reads and writes
props.hint: Total number of physical reads and writes.
props.query: SELECT average(`oracle.database.disk.readsPerSecond`) as 'Reads',average(`oracle.database.disk.writesPerSecond`) as 'Writes' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Total physical reads and writes in bytes
props.hint: Total physical reads and writes in bytes per second.
props.query: SELECT average(`oracle.database.disk.physicalReadBytesPerSecond`) as 'Physical reads', average(`oracle.database.disk.physicalWritesPerSecond`) as 'Physical writes' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: IO megabytes
props.query: SELECT average(`oracle.database.network.ioMegabytesPerSecond`) as 'IO megabytes' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Host CPU utilization
props.query: SELECT average(`oracle.database.hostCpuUtilization`) as 'CPU utilization' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Global bound memory
props.hint: Maximum size of a work area executed in automatic mode.
props.query: SELECT average(`memory.pgaMaxSize`) as 'Max size' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto
